comments:
I've got a null pointer exception when I try to parse this file

"context myMethod(i : MyObject) : MyObject 
pre 
	cond1: true = true
"

The Java source used for parsing is simple and available here http://rafb.net/p/K29acM86.txt.

Below is the stack trace :

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.ocl.internal.parser.OCLParser.operationCS(OCLParser.java:1101)
	at org.eclipse.ocl.internal.parser.OCLParser.operationContextDeclCS(OCLParser.java:1076)
	at org.eclipse.ocl.internal.parser.OCLParser.contextDeclCS(OCLParser.java:1054)
	at org.eclipse.ocl.internal.parser.OCLParser.packageDeclarationCS(OCLParser.java:1035)
	at org.eclipse.ocl.internal.parser.OCLParser.parsePackageDeclarationCS(OCLParser.java:765)
	at org.eclipse.ocl.OCL.parse(OCL.java:243)
	at TestOCL3.main(TestOCL3.java:69)

My Eclipse version :

Version: 3.3.0
Build id: I20070323-1616

I checkouted from CVS the org.eclipse.ocl* (v200703222230) and linked it to my project.

Committed a fix to the grammar definition, requiring operation context declarations to have the classifier name in addition to the operation name.  Thus, the result of parsing the example provided is now an (expected) ParserException, instead of a NullPointerException.
